content: The Giant Panda, native to China, primarily feeds on the leaves, stems, and shoots of what type of plant?

The Giant Panda, native to China, primarily feeds on the leaves, stems, and shoots of bamboo plants. Bamboo makes up about 99% of their diet, despite being a carnivore by descent, they have adapted to a herbivorous diet due to the scarcity of protein in bamboo. They consume a large amount of bamboo daily to meet their nutritional needs.
